name: Peace Lily
definition: Elegant plant with glossy leaves and white, hood-like blooms; air-purifying.
care_tips: Keep soil moist; prefers high humidity.
description: This elegant plant features glossy, dark green leaves and striking white, hood-like blooms that rise on slender stalks. It thrives in low to medium light and prefers consistently moist soil, making it ideal for indoor spaces. Known for its air-purifying qualities, it’s a favorite for beginners.

name: Snake Plant
definition: Upright, sword-like leaves in green or variegated patterns; very hardy.
description: The Snake Plant, also known as Sansevieria trifasciata, is renowned for its upright, sword-like leaves that come in various shades of green and striking variegated patterns. This hardy plant is exceptionally drought-tolerant, making it perfect for those who may forget to water regularly. It thrives in low light conditions and adds a modern touch to any indoor space.

name: ZZ Plant
definition: Glossy, waxy leaves on upright stems; thrives with neglect.
description: The ZZ plant has glossy, dark green, feather-like leaves that grow in an upright, graceful pattern. It’s highly drought-tolerant, surviving in low light and needing water only occasionally, ideal for forgetful plant owners. Its resilience and low care requirements make it a popular choice for homes and offices.

name: Monstera
definition: Large, split leaves with holes; trendy tropical climber.
care_tips: Water when top soil dries; use moss pole.
description: Known for its large, heart-shaped leaves with distinctive splits or holes, the monstera adds a tropical flair to interiors. It prefers bright, indirect light and moderate watering to keep its soil slightly moist. This plant’s bold foliage makes it a statement piece in any space.

name: Philodendron
definition: Heart-shaped or lobed leaves; versatile trailing or climbing plant.
care_tips: Water weekly; forgiving of irregular care.
description: This versatile plant features heart-shaped or elongated, glossy green leaves that cascade or climb depending on the variety. It adapts well to low or bright indirect light and prefers well-draining soil with moderate watering. Philodendrons are easy to care for, making them great for novice plant enthusiasts.

name: Aloe Vera
definition: Succulent with thick, spiky leaves containing soothing gel.
care_tips: Water deeply but infrequently; sandy soil.
description: This succulent boasts thick, fleshy, green leaves that store water, giving it a plump, sculptural look. It thrives in bright, indirect light and requires infrequent watering, making it low-maintenance. The gel inside its leaves is widely used for soothing skin burns and irritations.

name: Jade Plant
definition: Small, tree-like succulent with round, fleshy leaves; symbolizes luck.
description: With its thick, oval, jade-green leaves and sturdy, woody stems, this succulent resembles a miniature tree. It loves bright light and requires infrequent watering, allowing the soil to dry out completely between sessions. Often considered a symbol of prosperity, it’s a charming addition to sunny spots.

name: Rubber Plant
definition: Large, glossy dark green leaves; bold, upright growth.
care_tips: Water when top inch dries; wipe leaves.
description: This plant showcases large, glossy, dark green leaves that give it a bold, dramatic appearance. It thrives in bright, indirect light and needs moderate watering to maintain healthy growth. The rubber plant’s striking foliage makes it a standout choice for modern indoor decor.

name: Bird's Nest Fern
definition: Lush, wavy fronds in a rosette; loves humidity.
care_tips: Keep soil moist; mist for humidity.

name: Hoya
definition: Waxy leaves and star-shaped, fragrant flowers; trailing or climbing.

name: Areca Palm
definition: Feathery, arching fronds; adds tropical elegance indoors.
